siteMetadata.title: Life with a Twist of Lemon

node.excerpt: Dear Listener, Danchez liked our last episode! Nothing to complain about. On that note we jump into a topic that we’re sure he’ll have strong opinions on. Star Wars: The Rise of Skywalker - which is said to be the conclusion of the Skywalker Saga. Jon doesn’t have tickets yet. It…

frontmatter.title: Merry Star Warsmas
tags: life with a twist of lemon

node.excerpt: Not having hit $1000 for Fritsche yet (Fix this. Yes - you. convenient link to donation page). Netflix cancelled their Marvel shows, especially Daredevil. Four star reviews on a five star scale. Miracle whip. BLTs with copious amounts of mayonnaise. BLTs with undercooked bacon…
